citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 pm on
27-Feb-18. The licensee was called after arriving at the facility. She indicated that she was away and unavailable
for inspection.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 pm on
27-Feb-18.  The licensee was called after arriving at the facility.  She indicated that she was away and unavailable
for inspection.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
